channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13000] Backport HBASE-11240 (Print hdfs pipeline when hlog's sync is slow) to 0.98
item.description: Would be useful to learn about abnormal datanodes and slow seeks from logs in an 0.98 install too. Implement for 0.98, incorporating addendums.
item.summary: Backport HBASE-11240 (Print hdfs pipeline when hlog's sync is slow) to 0.98

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: let me know when you have this and I'll get HBASE-12997 on top of it as well as a part of that ticket.
Cool, thanks, I will do this tomorrow
actually I have this done for 0.98 already, if you don't mind me taking over the ticket.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12697658/HBASE-13000-0.98.1.patch
against 0.98 branch at commit 3d692cf044bc25327269328933299053ba19e2df.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12697658

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 23 warning messages.

+1 checkstyle. The applied patch does not increase the total number of checkstyle errors

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 5 new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

-1 release audit. The applied patch generated 42 release audit warnings (more than the master's current 0 warnings).

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .
